channel.title: Phase Monster Help
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Phase Monster Help" - I need to know something that could help me fight these things.

item.title: Re: Phase Monster Help
item.content:encoded: Several people have beaten Phases so far. Vysaga has beaten at least 2 and gotten the special drop you can get from them.

item.title: Re: Phase Monster Help
item.content:encoded: your dead thats what……so far even the kaijus doubt anyone beat them yet……

item.title: Re: Phase Monster Help
item.content:encoded:
The stat used when fighting Phases is Drain. Your base Drain Level is equal to that of your current Season. Only boosts that specifically effect Drain have any use. The only allies that help are R00t allies, such as Sporty Lvl 2 and Smokey the Bear Lvl 2.

When fighting Phases, there's a chance with each attack that you'll outright die. This percentage Base Chance is equal to the number of days that the Phase has been alive, +1. If you're feeling lucky, you can push that chance higher, for +50% damage for each .5% increase in death chance.

item.title: Phase Monster Help
item.content:encoded: Okay, so I entered the phase menu and got into a fight with one. I apparently can't use Bring Down the House or Tsukiballs and I don't quite understand the damage percent thing. I have Snakeman, Bones, and Blind Fury on my team as well since it appears to have no specific stat. I am fighting Magical Girls. Any suggestions on what to do?
